description:
Live Show Mondays brings you the part two of the September live show that featured Jessie Cox, Ami Emerson and special guest co-top Isis Love.
Jessie and Ami are brought out of the cage, and Isis roughs them up a bit. Then we put both girls into a difficult double bind, or predicament bondage. They are in a stappado, with a zipper pulling them to the floor. The girls legs can't take much of that kind of workout, and sooner or later they are going to have to pull the zipper. However the thought of enduring that is just too much for the girls to process, so they linger in a limbo of pain, not knowing what to do.
title: Jessie Cox, Ami Emerson, and Isis Love
